did.abstract: Materials relating to the Nationl Railroad Passenger Corporation relations with labor unions.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials relating to the Nationl Railroad Passenger Corporation relations with labor unions. Included are news clippings, press releases, collective bargaining agreements, and a photograph of AMTRAK's first labor contract signing in 1972.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.
